keyMoments.description: The crew realizes Thriller Bark is leaving the Florian Triangle, creating a time limit to defeat Moria before sunrise kills their shadowless members.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the urgent stakes for the crew's battle against Oars and Moria

keyMoments.description: Kuma reveals the World Government now considers the Straw Hats a serious threat after defeating Rob Lucci.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's rising reputation and the attention they've drawn from powerful forces

keyMoments.description: Blackbeard is revealed to have been appointed as a Warlord after capturing Portgas D. Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Major world-building moment showing the crew's rise to prominence and Blackbeard's official recognition

keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals Blackbeard was formerly a member of Whitebeard's crew before betraying them.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial backstory about Blackbeard's origins and betrayal

keyMoments.description: Moria enters the cockpit inside Oars, creating the ultimate combination of his tactical intelligence with the giant's power.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the peak of Moria's strategy and the crew's greatest threat
